description: This file defines a utility function `filterProfiles` that filters a list of `Profile` objects based on specified criteria encapsulated in `FilterCriteria`. The function supports filtering by hair color, race, religion, height, and weight, with placeholders for fields currently not present in the `Profile` model. It is meant to be used within the profile matching or filtering functionality of a frontend application.

methods.name: filterProfiles
methods.description: Filters a list of `Profile` objects based on the specified `FilterCriteria`. Supports categorical and range-based filters, with placeholders for future profile attributes.
